comments.body: Nit: It would be better to add a comment saying that the `partitionKeyFilters`  here is the same as the filters used in the partition pruning rule `PruneFileSourcePartitions`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +158,162 @@      // this partitionKeyFilters should be the same with the ones being executed in
      // PruneFileSourcePartitions
      val partitionKeyFilters = DataSourceStrategy.getPushedDownFilters(partitionColumns,
        normalizedFilters)
